content: this legal case involves two parties sklep and vrhovno sodišče rs ii dor 2372021 on september 1 2021 progress was made in the case the defendant has been ordered to pay the plaintiffs costs amounting to 709185 eur the case has been appealed to the supreme court and the details of compensation are yet to be determined the case involves a judgment on real estate properties including land buildings and a holiday home in croatia the defendant must also pay the plaintiff 2861746 eur for property damage the judgment was initially awarded in 2013 and confirmed by the high court the defendant municipality dravograd has already made the payment the plaintiff applied for a revision to the supreme court but their application was dismissed the supreme court made a decision on september 1 2021 dismissing the core application revision the applicant is requesting the court to declare joint property between the parties and to establish coownership of individual items the defendant must pay the plaintiff 2861746 eur for property damage the defendant has a 610 share of the total community property while the plaintiff has a 410 share the defendant is ordered to pay the applicants legal costs the defendant is requesting a review by the supreme court on various points the court has made a judgment regarding the division of movable property in a community property case but there were irregularities in the proceedings the supreme court allows a review of the decision the court of second instance disagrees with the previous rulings of the supreme court and the supreme court dismisses the application for further review the court of first instance refers to the previous ruling of the supreme court

metadata.CASE_ID: Sklep Vrhovnega sodišča RS II DoR 237/2021, 1. 9. 2021
metadata.financial_support: 7'091,85 EUR compensation and 28'617.46 EUR for property damage
